MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA17 postcode area of Darvel, affecting properties in Burnbank Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 1:39AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the repairs required on an underground cable fault on Ronaldcoup Road and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1:30PM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:15AM on 09 November 2020.
